attributes.action: instruct the cabinet office to investigate  the No10 petitions team  for their deliberate wilful obsfucation regarding the many genuine petitions submitted to the No10 team that have been wilfully disallowed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Furthermore we call for the cabinet office to remove from the No10 team  any member that is found guilty of deliberate subjective reasoning when deciding the veracity of fellow petitioners.

rejection.details: The Number 10 petitions team are civil servants and the Prime Minister cannot appoint or dismiss civil servants. If you have a complaint about any civil servants in the Cabinet Office (which includes Number 10), you can find details of the complaints procedure here: http://www.cabinetoffice.gov.uk/ContactUs/Complaints.aspx
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
